version_description:
OY! Is now even more amazing than ever!

Now you can EXPLORE contents in our new explore sections! Find interesting products & beautiful pictures from your OY! Friends & our official accounts.

Want to buy something? Donâ€™t be afraid to use our payment feature. It is safe and secure.

Introducing FAVORITE feature. Now you can add your frequent transactions as FAVORITE for easy and convenient transaction process.

Good news for BCA customers. Now you can use your BCA account to do transaction in OY! Using BCA VA (Virtual Account)

Introducing INSTANT PAY. You can do payment process easily & in no time. To use this feature you have to connect your Debit card first. Your security and confidentiality are guaranteed

If you have problem on connecting you debit card, you can use the MANUAL PAY feature. FREE payment process guaranteed. This feature is available for BCA, BRI, CIMB, Permata customers.

You can now top up your Shopeepay, Nu-Cash, Paytren, XL -tunai via OY

Introducing INSTANT PAY. You can do payment process easily & in no time. To use this feature you have to connect your Debit card first. Your security and confidentiality are guaranteed

If you have problem on connecting you debit card, you can use the MANUAL PAY feature. FREE payment process guaranteed. This feature is available for BCA, BRI, CIMB, Permata customers.

You can now top up your Shopeepay, Nu-Cash, Paytren, XL -tunai via OY

Introducing the new look & feel for OY!

Connect your internet banking account to monitor your current bank balance in OY!

Manual pay is now available for: BCA, BRI, CIMB, Permata, Bank Muamalat, DBS, Jenius, Danamon, UOB.

Introducing the new look & feel for OY!

Connect your internet banking account to monitor your current bank balance in OY!

Manual pay is now available for: BCA, BRI, BNI, CIMB, Permata, Bank Muamalat, DBS, Jenius, Danamon, UOB, BNI Syariah, Bank Syariah Mandiri, Bank Mega, Panin, KEB Hana, Commonwealth, MNC

Hey ho! Another week, another improvement! We know, sorting out all of your transaction is a painful process and we really wanted to make your life much, much easier. Therefore...

- You can now categorize all of your transaction history on both your Summary Page and Card Detail.
- Added method of transaction details in Transaction History tab.
- You can now delete those annoying 'waiting transfer' status.
- Bugs! Bugs! Bugs! They're all gone!
Fix issue when take picture for kyc

New year, new Hope. Your future is in your hands. Like, literally.


Not only tracking your income and expenses, but you can also now add all of your Asset and Liability on one page. The more assets you collect and the fewer liabilities you have, the better your future financial life will be!


Manage your financial life starting from today!
In this new and revolutionary version, we've squashed a plethora of bugs to improve performance. Enjoy our latest update and thank you for using OY!

What better way to kickstart 2020 with a whole new feature that can make your life more hassle-free!?
- Now, you can not only top up your Mandiri e-Money with OY! but can also see AND update your balance on the fly effortlessly!
- More bugs has been eradicated.

Heads up! New feature is on its way!
- Remember those annoying unique code you have to included when using Manual Transfer? Now you can cash it out when your Unique Code Balance has reached Rp10,000!
- Minimum transfer has been decreased to Rp10,000.
- You can now transfer up to 50 million Rupiah when using VA and Manual Transfer method.
- Pesky bugs has been eliminated.

Changes doesn't have to be big to be impactful. Even though today's update are small, we believe they are meaningful for you.
- You can now easily connect your debit card from Transfer page. No need to go back and forth again.
- To better represent the mechanic, Manual Transfer is now called Bank Transfer.
- For Android users, tapping up your e-Money card will lead you directly to top up page.
- Various small bug fixes.

While this is a challenging time for all of us, your support to help our country and community is needed now more than ever. You can now donate via OY! to Amanah Foundation, BAZNAS, and ACT. The donation will be used to help those affected the most by the disease. Click on the banner inside the app for more information.

Add your email to your profile page and get the latest news and promotions!

Even though travel restriction is everywhere nowadays, that doesn't mean you can't transfer fund abroad. To help ease up your life, you can now use Bank Transfer method to send money abroad.
Other than that, we have removed Notification tab and replaced it with Profile tab. Plus, bug fixes to smooth your experience even more.

We have a plethora of updates for you guys!
- You can now see all of your bank account balances from Summary Tab, of course, provided you have connected your internet banking with OY! which can also be done from this page.
- The name you provided during KYC process will be your eternal profile name and cannot be changed.
- We have added Live Chat feature which you can use whenever you encounter a problem while using OY! (we hope you don't have to use this feature though!)
- General bug fixes.We have a plethora of updates for you guys!
- You can now see all of your bank account balances from Summary Tab, of course, provided you have connected your internet banking with OY! which can also be done from this page.
- The name you provided during KYC process will be your eternal profile name and cannot be changed.
- We have added Live Chat feature which you can use whenever you encounter a problem while using OY! (we hope you don't have to use this feature though!)
- General bug fixes.

The Holy Month of Ramadhan is the perfect time for giving and that is exactly what OY! has to offer this week!
- Send personalized link to your friends for them to use OY! and you'll get extra GOPAY credit as much as Rp15.000! Don't worry, your friends will get bonuses as well!
- General bug fixes to make sure you'll always have smooth transaction experience.

We have huge updates available for you guys!
- You can now withdraw cash from every Alfamart counter all around the country by only using OY! No need to worry if you somehow forget to bring your wallet while shopping!
- UI improvement for Recent Recipients, Search and Filter features.
- Add refund status.
- General bug fixes.

This week's update is dedicated to you, gamers! You can now buy various video game vouchers for different platforms, from mobile, consoles, and even PC players! Don't worry, our vouchers are one of the cheapest you can get.

The available vouchers are:
- PUBG Mobile
- Steam
- PlayStation Plus Membership
- PlayStation Store Cash Card
- Nintendo eShop
- UniPin Credit

Other things to note, you can now choose Rp2,500,000 package in our Cash Out feature and transfer money using BCA's Debit Card as well!

Easier and faster transactions only with OY!
We know 16 characters are not much, therefore, we have increase character limits in transfer notes so you can add extra information for your recipient to read to.
For those who want to use BCA Debit Card for transactions, don't forget to activate your card's Online Debit feature first! You can do this via BCA mobile banking app.
General improvements, as always, have been done.

Whatâ€™s new in this version:
- You can now transfer money using International Transfer feature to Philippines and Australia.
- Weâ€™ve made various bug fixes to make sure everythingâ€™s running as smooth as possible.

What's new in this version:
- Merdeka main game

What's new in this version:
- Merdeka main game

Do you want to withdraw or deposit cash but forget to bring your wallet? Now you can Withdraw & Deposit Cash without card via OY! ATM in Alfamart
Currently, OY! ATMs are available at Cikokol, Sunter Jaya, Sukajadi, Kalibata, Petamburan & Kuningan Timur. Sst.. OY! ATM will be available soon across various cities in Indonesia.
In this version, you can transfer up to 49 million in one transfer & can update contacts when selecting recipients from Request feature. Good news, we have fixed the bugs!

Hi everyone! We have prepared something new in this update!
Introducing Billers feature where you can pay various bills with OY! Bills that you can pay:

- Mobile credit (pre-post paid)
- Packet data
- Cable TV and internet
- Electricity
- BPJS
- Water utility bill (PDAM)

Update your app and enjoy this feature now!

Hi everyone! Going outside is a risky business nowadays and, generally speaking, it is best if you just stay at home. That being said, we wish good health not only for you but your loved ones as well. To help you with that, we have decided to let you send unlimited referral codes. Now, everyone can do transactions safely without having to risk their well-being.

Be smart, be OY!

Hiya everybody! In this update, we have squashed a number of pesky bugs. They wonâ€™t trouble you again.
Also, several small fixes has been done to make sure youâ€™ll have smoother transactions!
Come on, update your OY! now! Pronto!

Hey folks! The good news is coming with this update!
First and foremost, we have eradicated those pesky bugs to help improve your daily transaction activities.
And for the other good news, we've partnered with Bibit, the leading investment platform in mutual funds! Get up to Rp90,000 cashback when paying Bibit's transaction with OY!
Download OY! and start investing now!

New update, new feature for you! Introducing Financial Product where we offer you various, you guessed it, Financial Product!
With the launching of this feature, you can now open Jenius bank account directly from OY! Not only that, there's Rp50,000 worth of Grab voucher when you've successfully open Jenius bank through OY!
Don't wait for too long, update your OY! and Grab the voucher now!

Wohooo!
Would love to transfer money and top up Gopay to multiple people at the same time?
Don't fret, bulk transaction to the rescue! With this update, you can now send money and top up Gopay to lots of people in one go! Your transactions have become more hassle-free!
Oh, and our engineers have worked tirelessly to eradicate pesky bugs, fantastic work!
Update your OY! now!

Wohooo!
Would love to transfer money and top up Gopay to multiple people at the same time?
Don't fret, bulk transaction to the rescue! With this update, you can now send money and top up Gopay to lots of people in one go! Your transactions have become more hassle-free!
Oh, and our engineers have worked tirelessly to eradicate pesky bugs, fantastic work!
Update your OY! now!

After weeks with no releases, big updates coming your way!


With this release, we freshen up the UI to make it more sleek and navigable. It is now more easier to do everything in OY! We have also update OY! Plus package for you, our Super User, with the introduction of Agent Plan. Agent Plan gives you 80 free transactions for as little as Rp70,000!


Wow, isn't it?


Last but not the least, we squashed bugs to ensure everything works smoothly.

Jalan-jalan ke Denmark,
Sampai Denmark makan kwaci
Pakai OY! makin enak,
karena ada fitur Pengembalian Dana langsung dari aplikasi!

Sst... kalau kemarin bisa buka rekening Jenius, sekarang kamu juga bisa buka rekening BRI di OY! #GakPakeRibet.

Selain itu, kamu juga bisa Tarik dan Setor Tunai di mesin OY! yang ada di Alfamidi seluruh Indonesia.

Seperti biasa, bugs-bugs sudah kita bersihkan!

Update OY! kamu sekarang yuk!

Hal baru apa saja yang bisa kamu dapatkan di OY! versi terbaru ini?
- Peningkatan tampilan untuk memudahkan navigasi
- Peningkatan sistem untuk memperlancar transaksi kamu
- Perbaikan berbagai bug dan peningkatan performa umum
Eits, jangan khawatir! Tunggu fitur-fitur baru dari OY! di tahun ini ya! Akan ada kejutan pastinya!

Wohooo! Siapa nih yang selalu minta "tambahin negara baru dong.."
Di versi kali ini, kami menambahkan daftar negara baru untuk transfer international. Berikut daftarnya:
1. Hongkong
2. Jepang
3. Jerman
4. Belgia
5. Norway
6. Sweden
7. Brazil
8. Italy
9. Rusia
10. Spanyol
Ssstt.. kamu juga bisa transfer internasional untuk keperluan bisnis ke negara Singapura, United Kingdom & Thailand. Selain itu, sekarang kamu bisa input kode promo di halaman profil.
Yuk, update aplikasi OY! kamu sekarang!
